SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.*, ROWNUM AS RNUM, COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOTCNT from(select d.did, d.reporter_id, d.dreason,d.ddate,u.unickname as reporter_nick, r.rpContent as rpContent from declaration d,reply r,users u where not reply_id is null and r.rpId = d.reply_id and d.reporter_id = u.user_id ORDER BY ddate DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{rreportcri.rowStart} AND #{rreportcri.rowEnd}

select d.did, d.reporter_id, d.reported_id, d.dreason, d.ddate, d.board_id, b.btitle, d.reply_id from board b,declaration d, users u where d.board_id = b.bid and d.reporter_id = u.user_id

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM message m, users u WHERE u.USER_ID = m.receiver_ID AND sender_id = #{user_id}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.*, ROWNUM AS RNUM, COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOTCNT from(select s.sId, s.sDate, s.user_id, s.board_id, b.bTitle, u.uNickname as tester FROM SCRAP s, BOARD b, USERS u WHERE b.bId = s.board_id AND s.user_id = u.user_id AND s.user_id= #{user_id}
